title: Wema unveils black card for 13th GAH Awards
description:
Wema Bank introduces the GAH Elite Club Black Card for the 13th GAH Awards and Business Summit, a Pan-African event celebrating innovation and growth.

Read More: https://punchng.com/wema-unveils-black-card-for-13th-gah-awards/
content: Wema Bank has unveiled the GAH Elite Club Black Card for the forthcoming 13th GAH Awards and Business Summit, with organisers describing it as a major step in expanding the platforms influence across… [+3845 chars]
